documentation.text: Creates {@code Option} objects describing a single command-line option by maintaining information regarding the short-name, the long-name, a flag indicating if an argument is required, and a self-documenting description.
Number of argument values the option can take.
Query to see if the option is required.
Query to see if the option can have an optional argument.
Display name for the argument value of the option.

template.text: Identifier of the model to process.
Classpath elements separated by ''{0}''. If starting with a ''@'' character, a file name of a file holding classpath elements.
Klassenpfad-Elemente mit ''{0}'' getrennt. Wenn mit ''@'' beginnend, Dateiname einer Textdatei mit Klassenpfad-Elementen.
Document filenames separated by ''{0}''. If starting with a ''@'' character, a file name of a file holding document filenames.
Dokument-Dateinamen mit ''{0}'' getrennt. Wenn mit ''@'' beginnend, Dateiname einer Textdatei mit Dokument-Dateinamen.
Name of the module to process.
Default language (defaults to system''s default locale).
Standard-Sprache (Standardlokalisierung des Systems, wenn nicht angegeben).
Directory to write resource files to.
Verzeichnis, in das Ressource-Dateien geschrieben werden sollen.
Directory holding the source files to manage.
Verzeichnis, in dem sich die zu verwaltenden Quelltextdateien befinden.
Directory holding the class files to process.
Verzeichnis, in dem sich die zu verarbeitenden Klassendateien befinden.
Name of the file to write the merged document to.
Name der Datei, in die das zusammengef√ºgte Dokument geschrieben werden soll.
Name of a XSLT file to use for transforming the merged document.
Name einer XSLT Datei, mit der das zusammengef√ºgte Dokument transformiert werden soll.
Module names separated by ''{0}'' of modules to include.
Module names separated by ''{0}'' of modules to exclude.
Line separator. (''\r\n'' for DOS, ''\r'' for Mac, ''\n'' for Unix). Defaults to the system''s line separator.
Zeilenvorschub. (''\r\n'' f√ºr DOS, ''\r'' f√ºr Mac, ''\n'' f√ºr Unix). Verwendet den System-Zeilenvorschub standardm√§√üig.
Name of the modlet to create.
Modlet names separated by ''{0}'' of modlets to include.
Modlet names separated by ''{0}'' of modlets to exclude.

documentation.text: The number of characters per line for the usage statement.
The number of characters of padding to be prefixed to each line.
The number of characters of padding to be prefixed to each description line.
The name of the command used to request help.

template.text: Geben Sie ¬ªjomc <Befehl> {0}¬´ f√ºr weitere Informationen ein.
Illegal arguments. Type ¬ªjomc {0} {1}¬´ for further information.
Ung√ºltige Argumente. Geben Sie ¬ªjomc {0} {1}¬´ f√ºr weitere Informationen ein.

documentation.text: List of providers to exclude from any {@code META-INF/services} file separated by {@code :}.
List of schema context-ids to exclude from any {@code META-INF/jomc-modlet.xml} file separated by {@code :}.
List of service classes to exclude from any {@code META-INF/jomc-modlet.xml} file separated by {@code :}.
List of modlet names to exclude from any {@code META-INF/jomc-modlet.xml} file separated by {@code :}.

template.text: {0}: Provider ''{2}'' from class path resource ''{1}'' ignored.
{0}: Service ''{2}'' from class path resource ''{1}'' ignored.
{0}: Context ''{2}'' from class path resource ''{1}'' ignored.
{0}: Modlet ''{2}'' from class path resource ''{1}'' ignored.
Classpath element ''{0}'' ignored. File not found.

documentation.text: Base JOMC {@code Command} implementation for processing modules.

template.text: Document file ''{0}'' ignored. File not found.
{0}: Module ''{1}'' from class path ignored. Module with identical name already loaded.
{0}: Modul ''{1}'' aus Klassenpfad ignoriert. Modul mit identischem Namen bereits geladen.

documentation.text: Command line interface for the {@code org.jomc.tools.ResourceFileProcessor} tool.

template.text:
Example: jomc generate-resources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -rd /tmp/rsrc \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v
jomc manage-sources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -sd /tmp/src \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -tp "jomc-java-bundles" \ -v

Beispiel: jomc generate-resources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -rd /tmp/rsrc \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v
jomc manage-sources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -sd /tmp/src \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -tp "jomc-java-bundles" \ -v

documentation.text: Command line interface for the {@code JavaSources} tool.

template.text: Example: jomc manage-sources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -sd /tmp/src \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v
Beispiel: jomc manage-sources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -sd /tmp/src \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v

documentation.text: Command line interface for committing model objects to class files with the {@code org.jomc.tools.ClassFileProcessor} tool.

template.text: Commits model objects to class files.
Example: jomc commit-classes -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -cd target/classes \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v
Beispiel: jomc commit-classes -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -cd target/classes \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v

documentation.text: Command line interface for validating model objects of class files with the {@code org.jomc.tools.ClassFileProcessor} tool.

template.text: Validates model objects of class files.

documentation.text: Command line interface for validating models.
Command line interface for merging modules.

template.text: Example: jomc merge-modules -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -xs examples/xslt/model-relocations.xsl \ -mn "Merged Name" \ -d /tmp/jomc.xml \ -v
Beispiel: jomc merge-modules -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -xs examples/xslt/model-relocations.xsl \ -mn "Merged Name" \ -d /tmp/jomc.xml \ -v

documentation.text: Command line interface for merging modlets.

template.text: Example: jomc merge-modlets -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -xs examples/xslt/modlet-relocations.xsl \ -mdn "Merged Name" \ -d /tmp/jomc-modlet.xml \ -v
Beispiel: jomc merge-modlets -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -xs examples/xslt/modlet-relocations.xsl \ -mdn "Merged Name" \ -d /tmp/jomc-modlet.xml \ -v
